title: Companion Approval Guide
content: - Out in the yard of the Sword Coast Couriers, the 'post office' of the village. Camp Astarion's siblings confront you in your camp, you get approval if you tell him "The world can be a wonderful, kind place" The Pale Elf Requirement/s: Killed Cazador Astarion + Astarion Camp - Event Talk to Minsc after getting him as companion and after Tell him "There is some good in all.." And when talking about the blunt blade, say it's "barbaric" Requirement/s: After "Guild matters till the end" Minsc + Cam
